title: American Institute of Real Estate Appraisers Journal
aka: American Institute of Real Estate Appraisers of the National Association of Real Estate Boards Journal
The Journal of the American Institute of Real Estate Appraisers
The Journal of the American Institute of Real Estate Appraisers of the National Association of Real Estate Boards
additional-note: Date of last issue based on journal name given in CCE renewal records.  Some Worldcat records have this journal changing its name to 'The Appraisal Journal' in the middle of volume 7, rather than after its end.
